1: Then Bildad the Shuhite answered and said,\q
2:
"Dominion and fear are with him;\q he makes order in his high places of heaven.
\q
3:
Is there any end to the number of his armies?\q Upon whom does his light not shine?


\q
4:
How then can man be righteous with God?\q How can he who is born of a woman be clean, acceptable to him?
\q
5:
See, even the moon has no brightness to him;\q the stars are not pure in his sight.
\q
6: How much less man, who is a wormâ€”\q a son of man, who is a worm!"
